title: Still Dropping in FPS Dell 7559
body:
Hi Again,

Been playing league for ages now, ever since upgrading my laptop, I have had weird drops in FPS from 60-20 or so for like a second, this normally happens when I go into a game. I have done various tests, monitoring my temps etc, but I cant seem to find any problems there. Other games like gta5 can play on just about full with no issues, I have also played tomb raider and a few other and havent had any issues. I play in 1080 and it is set as my default all round resolution. I have been through the whole ticket process and done all that was asked but to no avail, just hoping there is someone out there with a solution.

here is what I have done

- Updated Drivers
- Unistalled/Re-installed lol
- Used the hextech tool
- Updated all other drivers
- Formatted and re-installed windows


I wonder if it could have something to do with my hardrive being 5200rpm, would an m.2 ssd help ? or perhaps because the 4k screen is set at a lower resolution it casues issues ?

Below are my specs 

Dell 7559 GRY (4K)
GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB
Intel Core i7 6700HQ (2.60 GHz)
16 GB Memory 
1 TB HDD (5200)
15.6" 4K UHD Touchscreen 3840 x 2160

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
In cases where your pc is [too good](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs), you could run into fps issues.  You may need to cap your framerate in-game to see if that helps.    There could just be bad game files too, so I recommend double checking our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out some more possibilities.

Should that not help, grab the logs from the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly to see what the deal is.
